metadata.name: This is fine
metadata.description:
For my upcoming album "Rigmarole" I have partnered up with the multidisciplinary artist Chris Kore to create a series of visual works for each track on the album.


In the words of Chris Kore:
"A series of Rigmarole loops open unique visual aspects of the mysterious modular creature by showing separate functional parts of it that reflects each track from the release.
It's a sacred birth of a modular creature. Slow, mysterious and meditative. Something is about to arise...Wait, did you just see that too?"


Animation by Chris Kore
Music by Colin Benders
